content:
分類： 活動公告
來源： 國際事務處國際學生組 - 陳良愛 - issa@gms.ndhu.edu.tw - 電話5107
對象： 全校學生
標題： Exchange Students Experience Sharing Session【Poland】【In English】
日期： Thu, 19 Dec 2024 09:13:29 +0800

The exchange students experience sharing session for this semester, hosted by Office of International Affairs, invites previously returned exchange students to share their experiences from sister schools University of Lodzg in Poland.

The event promises to be engaging and informative, and we encourage students to take advantage of this opportunity to participate.

Meal boxes will be provided at the venue and available for collection at the conclusion of the event, subject to availability.

Registration for the event is open from now until 12:00 PM on December 25th.
https://sys.ndhu.edu.tw/SA/XSL_ApplyRWD/ActAnnounce.aspx?ActID=23735

If the registration deadline has passed or if all slots have been filled, students are welcome to be on-site as stand-by participants.

attachments.fileSize: If the registration deadline has passed or if all slots have been filled, students are welcome to be on-site as stand-by participants.
